DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare Equinox Personal Coaching exercise training method self-directed exercise training help subject become fit . Men 30 44 year age exercise regular basis interested receiving Equinox personal training invited participate . The investigator enroll 36 subject University California , Los Angeles ( UCLA ) , site . The hypothesis study subject randomize Personal Coaching Method result significantly great lean mass accrual randomize self-directed training 12 week study . Subjects 2 Baseline visit 1 week , randomize receive either Coached training self-training , 12 week , complete two End Study visit final week . Visits 1 3 include questionnaire , skinfold fat/lean body mass measurement , strength aerobic performance test , take place Equinox . Visits 2 4 include DEXA scan ECG , take place UCLA .
DOC.brief_title: Equinox Personal Coaching Versus Self-Directed Exercise
DOC.criteria: Men age 3044 year Body mass index less 30 kg/m2 . Currently exercise without coach 4 day less 8 day per month past three month ( Equinox Motivated Super Motivated category ) ; Willing commit 12 week thrice weekly training Century City Equinox club without Equinox coach . Over age 44 Musculoskeletal condition limit participation Unstable cardiovascular , pulmonary , metabolic , disorder would preclude high intensity exercise training .
